roleset_name: to come into conflict, be in opposition

roles.descr: 1st, all in one mention, or agentive clasher
entity clashed with when separat constituent
roles.descr_trans: 当单独的组成部分时，实体发生冲突

roleset_name: (cause to) emit a clashing noise, or cause discord between two non-agentive things

roles.descr: agent, one causing a clashing noise
roles.descr_trans: 特工，一名造成冲突噪音的特工
主题，事物与事物发生冲突

roles.descr: location, thing that the theme clashes against

roleset_name_trans: （导致）发出冲突的噪音，或引起两个非能动事物之间的不和谐
